name: MPMusicPlayerMediaItemQueueDescriptor
desc: A set of properties and methods used to modify audio media items in the playerâ€™s media queue.

items.name: init(itemCollection: MPMediaItemCollection)
items.desc: Creates a new queue descriptor using the designated collection.

items.name: init(query: MPMediaQuery)
items.desc: Creates a new queue descriptor using the designated query.

items.name: var itemCollection: MPMediaItemCollection
items.desc: Contains the media item collection used to create the queue descriptor.

items.name: var query: MPMediaQuery
items.desc: Contains the media items found by the query used to create the queue descriptor.

items.name: var startItem: MPMediaItem?
items.desc: Designates the media item that will be played first.

items.name: func setStartTime(TimeInterval, for: MPMediaItem)
items.desc: The time the designated media item is to start playing.

items.name: func setEndTime(TimeInterval, for: MPMediaItem)
items.desc: The time the designated media item is to stop playing.
